## Input.setCheck() method

Change a connection's compatibility.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setCheck(check: string | string[] | null): Input;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  check | string \| string\[\] \| null | Compatible value type or list of value types. Null if all types are compatible.  The input being modified (to allow chaining). |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Input](./blockly.input.md)
